alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:47PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fort Bend, northeastern Brazoria and southern Harris Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 247 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Pearland. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pearland, Manvel, Fresno, Greater Hobby Area, western South Belt / Ellington, Brookside Village, Iowa Colony, Minnetex, South Acres / Crestmont Park, Fort Bend Houston and southeastern Central Southwest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Harris
